0100001011011111 1110101101111000 1 -> sum: 0010111001011000, cout: 1
0011001100110010 1010101111100001 0 -> sum: 1101111100010011, cout: 0
0110100100011110 1110010011010110 0 -> sum: 0100110111110100, cout: 1
1101010001101011 0111100001000100 0 -> sum: 0100110010101111, cout: 1
1010110101101000 0011010000000001 1 -> sum: 1110000101101010, cout: 0
1111100001101010 1100100000111011 0 -> sum: 1100000010100101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
